welcome.story:
Long long ago, there is monster.

He hid a lot of treasure in the cave.

Do you want it?

You have to guess his riddles...

riddle.title: Clever Word
riddle.story: What word contains all of the twenty six letters?

riddle.title: One Word
riddle.story:
My first is often at the front door.

My second is found in the cereal family.

My third is what most people want.

My whole is one of the United States.

riddle.title: Take It Or Leave It
riddle.story: The more you take, the more you leave behind. What am I?

riddle.title: Shifting Colors
riddle.story:
What is black when you buy it, red when you use it,

and gray when you throw it away?

riddle.title: First And Last
riddle.story: What belongs to you, but other people use it more than you?

riddle.title: Wooden Case
riddle.story:
I am taken from a mine, and shut up in a wooden case,

from which I am never released,

and yet I am used by almost everybody.

riddle.title: Put Me Out
riddle.story:
I am not alive, but I grow;

I don't have lungs, but I need air;

I don't have a mouth, but water kills me.

What am I?

riddle.title: Do You Have It?
riddle.story:
Poor people have it.

Rich people need it.

If you eat it you die.

what is it?

riddle.title: What To Wear
riddle.story: What did the tree wear to the pool?

riddle.title: Time Passes
riddle.story:
You have me today,

Tomorrow you'll have more;

As your time passes,

I'm not easy to store;

I don't take up space,

But I'm only in one place;

I am what you saw,

But not what you see.

What am I?

riddle.title: Snowman's Breakfast
riddle.story: What does a snowman like to eat for breakfast?

riddle.title: Railroad Crossing
riddle.story:
Railroad Crossing, look out for the cars.

Can you spell that, without any R's?

riddle.title: A Time When They Are Green
riddle.story:
A time when they are green,

a time when they're brown,

but both of these times, cause me to frown.

But just in between, for a very short while,

They're perfect and yellow and cause me to smile!

What am I talking about here?

riddle.title: Valentine Reindeer
riddle.story: Which one of Santa's reindeer can be seen on Valentines day?

riddle.title: Palindrome
riddle.story: What 7 letter word is spelled the same way backwards and forewords?

riddle.title: Nuts & Shells
riddle.story: What kind of nut has no shell?

riddle.title: No One Ever Saw Me, Nor Ever Will
riddle.story:
I never was, am always to be.

No one ever saw me, nor ever will.

And yet I am the confidence of all,

To live and breathe on this terrestrial ball.

What am I?
